rules.text: Clear [harm]: You feel the swamp shudder. Add 1[harm] to each other Hydraworm in play.
If this being has 1 or more [harm], the swamp churns. »» Search the path deck and discard for a Hydraworm and put it into play.
If there is another Hydraworm in the same area as this one, they spread out. »» Move this being.
Exhaust this being. »» Suffer 1 injury.
FOC + [exploration]: Discern [2] the movements of the courageous rodent to exhaust this being. Add 1[progress] to it, and 2[progress] to a feature, for every 2 effort.
If there are no predators in play, exhaust this being. »» Draw a path card.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
Response: After a being is cleared by [harm], attach it facedown to this feature.
Refresh: Discard 1 facedown card attached to this feature.
X is equal to the twice the number of facedown cards attached to this feature.
You may exhaust your role. If you do not, this feature fatigues you.
Obstacle.
You can add a maximum of 1[progress] per test to this feature.
Exhaust your role.
AWA + [exploration]: Discover [2] a way into the ancient structure to move your [Ranger Token] to this feature.
Clear [progress]: If a [Ranger Token] is on this feature, delve into the ruins. 9.2
Clear [harm]: The crumbling structure churns the swamp. Draw a path card. If it is a Hydraworm, it fatigues you.
If there is an active Hydraworm, it damages the foundation. »» Add 1[harm] to this feature.
FOC + [reason]: Activate [2] the rumbling dynamo to add 1[harm] to each feature and being in play for every 2 effort.
Clear [harm]: The crumbling structure churns the swamp. Draw a path card. If it is a Hydraworm, it fatigues you.
If there is an active Hydraworm, it damages the foundation. »» Add 1[harm] to this feature.
If there is a water feature within reach of 1 or more Rangers, they feel a jolt. »» Those Rangers suffer 1 injury.
SPI + [exploration]: Imagine life as hydraworm to intuit the location of their lair to add [progress] equal to your effort.
Clear [progress]: Set this card aside. When you next travel, you may travel to The Marsh of Rebirth.
If there is an odd number of [progress] on this feature, you lose the trail. »» Discard it.
